page.title: 05HOUSING COUNT & SITE VISIT
page.content:
A house extension being built by a local builder was studied in the course of construction. The two metre deep concrete foundation was built on solid rock. Fibre-glass filled a two inch cavity between the two courses in the twelve- inch thick walls. The work team included one skilled,one semi-skilled, and one unskilled worker. When finished, the extension would contain a lounge, bedroom and stairs. It was begun in April and was expected to be finished in October. { A housing survey was carried out, including the part out of the D-block.
H C B Fl Fa TOTAL Baslow 349 82 82 19 10 542 ) Cubar 90 32 29 1 1 153 ) 918 Calver 147 58 14 2 2 223 ) KEY: H= Houses, C= Cottages, Fl=Flats, B=Bungalows, Fa= Farms.
